name: Arcade Compilation 1 & 2
description:
A compilation of 8 self made arcade games.

It includes: Berzerk HD, Maziacs HD, Wizard of Wor Remake, Copter Classic, Tank Duel, Horace Return of the Spiders, Super GT Mini and Parachute Academy.

All uses arrows to move and control or space to jump or shoot.

Berzerk HD also uses WASD to shoot in four directions.

Please enjoy.
